mapper.select: select chat_no, room, send_nick, recv_nick, to_date(send_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') send_time, read_time, content, read_chk from chat where chat_no in (select max(chat_no) from chat group by room) and (send_nick = #{member_nick} or recv_nick=#{member_nick}) order by chat_no desc
select count(chat_no) from chat where recv_nick=#{member_nick} and read_chk=0 and room=#{room}

choose.when: insert into chat values(SEQ_CHAT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{room}, #{send_nick}, #{recv_nick}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{content}, 0);
choose.otherwise: insert into chat values(SEQ_CHAT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{room}, #{send_nick}, #{recv_nick}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{content}, 0);
